8. A minimum cervical dilatation rate of 1 cm/hour 
throughout active first stage is unrealistically fast for 
some women and is therefore not recommended for 
identification of normal labour progression. A slower than 
1 cm/hour cervical dilatation rate alone should not be a 
routine indication for
